body:
hey guys, so its been 2 years since I joined Avicus and I have to be honest, I love every minute on it!! I love logging into teamspeak and chatting with the great people, I love seeing all the topics on the forums, I love the hours of game-play on the server. I hope Avicus survives for may more years because I absolutely love all of it!! 
So I decided to do an AMA, because that's now a thing again!
So , ask away...

title: 2 Year AMA!

replies.body:
Hey! Well congrats on two years!!

Food?
Colour?
Map?
Gamemode?
Subject?
Goal?
Best part of Avicus?
Relationship status?

replies.body: Pizza, Turquoise blue, Original Senex 1, SG or TDM, Science, Staff member on Avicus, community, Single for now.
